title._content: Image taken from page 71 of 'The Sinking of the “Merrimac”: a personal narrative of the adventure in the harbor of Santiago de Cuba, June 3, 1898, and of the subsequent imprisonment of the survivors. [With illustrations.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Sinking of the “Merrimac”: a personal narrative of the adventure in the harbor of Santiago de Cuba, June 3, 1898, and of the subsequent imprisonment of the survivors.
